text: Wauāthe hauddusenehethau nananene hahavaa, Jāedaā, hadaugauhauwunathe hajaheede hasesāe, hau daujenauhauwaude havadauhaude hathāsewau nehayau hasesāe? Nananene jayaudauwunaedehe, nedauau haugauhune havadauhaude hathāsewau nehayau hasesāe, nau hadenaāeneauvane hadenaāeneaugauhauwu jaheede hethāsathau hahavaa hesesāe.
